definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: SCOOT's primary aim is keep traffic flowing smoothly and pedestrians safe.
sentences.chinese: SCOOT的首要目标是保持交通顺畅和步行者安全。

sentences.english: Two nights later, the Nets surrendered a 72-point first half to the Indiana Pacers.
sentences.chinese: 两天后，篮网半场又让步行者拿了71分。

sentences.english: SCOOT'sprimary aim is keep traffic flowing smoothly and pedestrians safe.
sentences.chinese: SCOOT的首要目标是保持交通顺畅和步行者安全。

sentences.english: Trees sway, walkers push into the wind.
sentences.chinese: 树木摇摆，步行者推入风。

sentences.english: And cyclists had more soot in their lungs than walkers.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车者比步行者更多。

sentences.english: Madrid is once again a city for walkers.
sentences.chinese: 马德里曾是个步行者的城市。
下颚打浆机秸秆画上步行者。

sentences.english: This is the AT-AT Walkers from Star Wars.
sentences.chinese: 这是AT，在步行者的星球大战。

sentences.english: NBA Indiana Pacers is one of the great teams in Indy.
sentences.chinese: NBA印第安纳步行者队是印地的优秀球队之一。

sentences.english: The top 17 neighborhoods in San Francisco are Walkers' Paradises.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山最好的17个居住区堪称“步行者的天堂”。

sentences.english: Steps cut in the hillside give walkers an easy passage down the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 山坡上凿出的台阶使步行者下山变得容易。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
